Articles.Content: I already sent a request.
Why lock it. Litetally all you have to do is answer posts and post up my suggestions to page one to streamline things
Because Then I can control what goes on their easier.
Don't lock it
It's only temporary, like, for a day or two. So I can get things under control.
Ok, a space shuttle specific TDRS is currently being handled!
Mike clean your inbox please

Ok, a space shuttle specific TDRS is currently being handled!

Cant you just make a config to rescale an d add nodes or something?

Cant you just make a config to rescale an d add nodes or something?

Raidernick does not allow,us to modify his stuff.

Ok thats cool. But anyway its not directly modifying it. More an emulation.

Adding to it without modifying origional.

Like contact lenses in a way...

Ok thats cool. But anyway its not directly modifying it. More an emulation.

Wow you replied fast lol.

Ok thats cool.

So... I need to get back to my worklist.

Dreamer and x37 b and c then x38 I think

Wow you replied fast lol.

Ok thats cool.

So... I need to get back to my worklist.

Dreamer and x37 b and c then x38 I think

Ok, btw, when i get internet back at the new house, i am going to need to talk to you on skype.

Cant you use it on the device you are using now?

Also can someone tell me how to give rep? I have been wanting to send it out for ages
You click on the little star icon on the post next to the caution symbol
Thanks!
I cant get it to work on my phone. Regarding rep, see the little star at the bottom of my post? Press,that to give rep.
Hey mike, just wanted to commend you for the work you've put in! Taking Challenger out now with an all female crew (THAT is a lot of pheremones)

Hey mike, just wanted to commend you for the work you've put in! Taking Challenger out now with an all female crew (THAT is a lot of pheremones)

Well thanks. I have had tantrums but havent stopped. I do it for everyone's benefits but also to feed my addiction lol.

All females. ... surround sound!

Well thanks. I have had tantrums but havent stopped. I do it for everyone's benefits but also to feed my addiction lol.

All females. ... surround sound!

Yeah, just remember, i am doing my best, but i have a tough time doing what i need for ssp when my mom is getting on my case for just bein on the forum
Wow I just fell asleep... First time I slept for more then 2 hours in months

Wow I just fell asleep... First time I slept for more then 2 hours in months

you're on the road to recovery!

you're on the road to recovery!

I have never been the sleeping type tho. Lol the forums should know that. I'm on here 24/7

Yeah, just remember, i am doing my best, but i have a tough time doing what i need for ssp when my mom is getting on my case for just bein on the forum

I can understand it is difficult for you but undetsrand I need someone who can keep up with the speed of the growth and demand of the mod. Also it shows its going to take someone with proven experience to live up to these demands.

By all means I need your enthusiasm and ideas but require that extra input.

Thus is not only my oppinion but that voiced by other users here

Hope this makes sense and just want to give this mod what it deserves

- - - Updated - - -

I have never been the sleeping type tho. Lol the forums should know that. I'm on here 24/7

I know that feel but im not that bad anymore. Its a hard habit to break and restore sleep patterns

I can understand it is difficult for you but undetsrand I need someone who can keep up with the speed of the growth and demand of the mod. Also it shows its going to take someone with proven experience to live up to these demands.

By all means I need your enthusiasm and ideas but require that extra input.

Thus is not only my oppinion but that voiced by other users here

Hope this makes sense and just want to give this mod what it deserves.

Mike, did you ever contact mharrizone? This person seems to have the experience you are looking for

Here is his/her post from the SSP page in case you missed it:

Hey, Sampa, Mike, Spock, and whoever else is on the team:

First of all, I want to say I LOVE this mod, and thanks so much to you all for putting this together! The SSP is such an iconic space program, and mods like this and FASA are what keep me coming back for more KSP. I recently installed the ISS mod, and I'm having loads of fun assembling the station - 3 modules up already!

Second, I've been checking the comments on the SSP threads now and then, and I noticed there seems to be a lot of organizational and inter-personal issues that keep popping up. If you're interested, I have quite a bit of software project management experience, and I'm absolutely willing to help out as a project manager to take some of the load off of y'all's backs. I can help with things like: roadmapping what needs to be done next; assigning tasks to whoever's available; streamlining and simplifying versions and releases; keeping track of bugs; and maybe even some of the community-facing support. Overall just keeping things organized so you guys don't have to keep track of it all and can focus on doing what you love most.

Send me a PM if you'd like to talk more, I'm eager to help in any way I can!"
